changes.details: Removed defines.php, WPLib_Enums, wplib_define(), WPLib_Enum::get_enum(), WPLib_Enum::set_enum().

Removed WPLIB_RUNMODE, WPLib_Runmode, WPLib::runmode(), WPLib_Runmode::STAGING, WPLib_Runmode::PRODUCTION, WPLib_Runmode::TESTING, WPLib_Runmode::DEVELOPMENT, WPLib::is_testing(), WPLib::is_staging().
Established define('WPLIB_DEVELOPMENT',true) in wp-config-local.php as the official way to switch to development/debug mode.  Added WPLib::set_is_development() and WPLib::set_is_production()

Removed the obfuscation in WPLib class intended to hide code from a scanner that would pedantically flag the code as a concern -- even though the code was used properly -- to avoid having to debate pedantic agent of former client.
Refactored WPLib::get_module_class() calling signature to use $args as the 2nd parameter.
